issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

fields.description: After HDFS-10426, the test {{TestPendingInvalidateBlock#testPendingDeletion}} still fails sometimes. As [~iwasakims] commented in HDFS-10426(https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HDFS-10426?focusedCommentId=15539826&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels:comment-tabpanel#comment-15539826), we should add a line {{DFSTestUtil.waitForReplication}} to wait for the IBR and not do the assert opertion first.

comments.body: Attach a simple patch for this.

Thanks for working on this Yiqun Lin, LGTM overall some really small nits:

* Consider renaming {{waitForBlocksToDelete(int)}} to something like {{waitForNumPendingDeletionBlocks}}, wasn't clear to me what this method was doing based on the name.
* Consider renaming {{remainedBlocks}} to just {{numBlocks}} if you do the above, more clear and grammatical.
Thanks [~andrew.wang] for the review and comments. Attach a new patch to address the comments.

The failed test are not related. Hi, [~andrew.wang], can make a quick look if the latest patch looks good to you? I see that this test was frequently fails recently(In HDFS-11003, it fails again:(, link address: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HDFS-Build/17135/testReport/).
Committed to trunk, branch-2, branch-2.8. Thanks for the contribution [~linyiqun]!

SUCCESS: Integrated in Jenkins build Hadoop-trunk-Commit #10605 (See [https://builds.apache.org/job/Hadoop-trunk-Commit/10605/])
HDFS-10990. TestPendingInvalidateBlock should wait for IBRs. Contributed (wang: rev fdce515091f0a61ffd6c9ae464a68447dedf1124)
* (edit) hadoop-hdfs-project/hadoop-hdfs/src/test/java/org/apache/hadoop/hdfs/server/blockmanagement/TestPendingInvalidateBlock.java
It looks like branch-2 build is failing after this.
Thanks for the catch Kihwal. I've reverted this from the three branches.

Doing a little googling, I think this might be related to JDK8 vs. JDK7's treatment of anonymous inner classes:

http://stackoverflow.com/questions/4732544/why-are-only-final-variables-accessible-in-anonymous-class

I'm attaching a trivial change to Yiqun's patch that makes numBlocks final. I tested compilation on branch-2 locally.

SUCCESS: Integrated in Jenkins build Hadoop-trunk-Commit #10607 (See [https://builds.apache.org/job/Hadoop-trunk-Commit/10607/])
Revert "HDFS-10990. TestPendingInvalidateBlock should wait for IBRs. (wang: rev 8c721aa00a47a976959e3861ddd742f09db432fc)
* (edit) hadoop-hdfs-project/hadoop-hdfs/src/test/java/org/apache/hadoop/hdfs/server/blockmanagement/TestPendingInvalidateBlock.java
